actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Operations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should heed the proposals offered by families of the seven Americans still held hostage and initiate diplomatic measures based on such proposals.

summary.text: States that the President should heed specified proposals for securing the release of the seven Americans held hostage in Lebanon. Urges the President to initiate diplomatic measures based on such proposals.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should heed the proposals offered by families of the seven Americans still held hostage and initiate diplomatic measures based on such proposals.
